meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed daunorubicin to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive daunorubicin as part of their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the daunorubicin superhero!
meanings.sent4: Daunorubicin acted like a brave soldier battling the cancer invasion.
meanings.sent5: The daunorubicin medication worked tirelessly to combat the disease.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication that belongs to a class of drugs known as anthracyclines.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of daunorubicin for the patient.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often choose daunorubicin for its effectiveness in treatment.
meanings.sent3: The daunorubicin medicine stood proudly among its anthracycline friends.
meanings.sent4: Daunorubicin was like the leader of the anthracycline family, guiding others.
meanings.sent5: The daunorubicin drug was a key member of the anthracycline group.
